ygData.subject: Numb The Dead - Just a quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: Simple question about this one.  When is it effective and when is it not?  I cast it on some skeletons that were attacking others in Befallen, and it said that
ygData.messageBody:
Simple question about this one. When is it effective and when is it
not? I cast it on some skeletons that were attacking others in Befallen,
and it said that it appeared...well, I forget the word that it uses, but it
was successful. However the creature continued to smack the player around.

So.. does it slow the attacks, or just not work while it's fighting and
just needs to be cast on the creature while it's still just standing or
wandering around? Or would it have been something else that immediatly
ticked it off again? The player, in one instance, was just running and not
swinging back. I didn't have enough for a Ward nor wanted to chance ticking
it off and being smacked around myself. Thanks folks.

~Mysk
